About Us

Geo‑Mapping Consults Ltd delivers world‑class geospatial information services. We provide accurate land surveys, advanced remote sensing, GIS data management and cutting‑edge analysis to empower infrastructure, environmental and commercial projects. Our seasoned professionals harness the latest technology to deliver precise, timely and reliable results.

Our years of experience and innovations have allowed us to expand into a new era by offering cut edge technological services and a consistent forward thinking approach in serving our clients. We strongly believe that success is achieved through commitment, integrity, discipline, innovation and professionalism.

Learn More

Our Team


Meet the Experts Powering the Success

Surv. Azeez Saleem Adewale

CEO & Principal Partner

Surv. Adejare Adekunle Quadri

Surv. Adewora Babalola Monsur

Head, Training & Capacity Development

Surv. Akiode Emmanuel Oluwafemi

Projects Manager

Tech. Idris Azeez

Technical Crew Officer

Azeez A Idris B.Sc is a vibrant fresh graduate of Surveying and Geoinformatics from the University of Lagos with varied cognate and field experience in geospatial data acquisition and Cadastral Survey, as well as GIS and remote sensing applications. He has international certification in Autodesk with extensive practical driven experience in the use of Matlab, Python for GIS Data Acquisition and Mapping. He is reputable member of Young Surveyor Network (YSN)

Surv. Azeez Saleem Adewale

SURV. AZEEZ, Saleem Adewale ( Mnis) is the CEO of Geo-Mapping Consults Ltd and serves at the capacity of Principal Partner. He is a practioner registered surveyor and holds a M.Sc in PROJECT MANAGEMENT, B.SC in Surveying and Geo-informatics. He has worked at the capacity of a managing partner and field consultant in a number of successful projects with extensive experience in Engineering, Cadastral Survey, as well as GIS a. He has over 2 decades of cognate field experience in spatial Data Acquisition, Remote Sensing, Surveying and Integrated construction projects He is a reputable corporate member of NIGERIAN INSTITUTION OF SURVEYORS and ASSOCIATION OF PRIVATE PRACTISING SURVEYORS NIGERIA.

Surv. Adejare Adekunle Quadri(Mnis, B SC. MSc, PhD)

Surv.Quadri Adekunle Adejare B.Sc, M.Sc, PhD,. He has authored many publications in local and international books and journals. His research activities focus principally on surveying and spatial planning, with an emphasis on marine surveying/seabed mapping

Surv.Akiode Emmanuel Oluwafemi(BSc)

Surv.Akiode Emmanuel Oluwafemi is a seasoned environmentalist and practictioning Surveyor with over 6 years varied experience in integrated approach to offshore and onshore geospatial data acquisition. He is a certified offshore surveyor with extensive experience in Engineering and Cadastral Survey, GIS and remote sensing applications in Geospatial acquisition. He holds a Bachelor of Science in Surveying and Geoinformatics

Surv. Adewara M Babalola B.Sc., M.Sc

Surv. ADEWARA M. Babalola, B.Sc., M.Sc., is a seasoned environmentalist and an astute mentor training and mentoring students in the field of Surveying and Geoinformatics, some of which are registered surveyors. His research interest is in Surveying and mapping with majors in Flood hydraulics and hydrological modelling. He has research publications in several journals both locally and internationally as well as textbook. Surv. Adewara also has certification in project management from the project management Institute, certificate of proficiency in IT from AfriHub Africa and NIIT.

Our Services

Land Surveying

Perimeter, cadastral and topographic surveys that provide the foundation for precise land documentation and development.

Marine & Bathymetric

Sea‑bed measurements, tidal observations and modelling for offshore construction and environmental monitoring.

Remote Sensing

High‑resolution satellite imagery and drone data for land use analysis, environmental assessment and resource management.

Project Management

Comprehensive project planning and execution using industry best practices to deliver on time and within budget.

Surveying & Mapping

Precise field surveys using GNSS and total stations.

Construction Projects

Comprehensive land development and building layouts.

Marine Operations

Hydrographic and offshore surveying services.
